author: GamingBolt
description:
Dollhouse: Behind the Broken Mirror wants to tell a creepy story by having the player dive into the mind of its protagonist, Eliza de Moor. While a celebrated singer, Eliza one day collapses in the middle of her performance. On waking up to find out that she has lost all of her memories, Eliza agrees with Dr. Stern’s plans to bring her memories back by taking Eliza back to her hometown.

Unfortunately, the slow movement speed and tedious combat tend to sap any sense of fun that could be had in the game. While there is certainly an admirable attempt at setting up a thick atmosphere that makes the player tense around every corner, the general lack of polish in both gameplay and visuals end up making the very idea of playing Dollhouse: The Broken Mirror a frightening one.
title: Dollhouse: Behind The Broken Mirror Review - A Bland Horror Game

author: GamingBolt
description:
There’s a lot to do and a lot to see in Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ gorgeous, massive, and impressively diverse open world feudal Japanese map. No matter how much time you spend in it, it keeps finding new ways to impress you, and often, it does that with an obsessive level of attention to detail. 

From the environments and how they change with the shifting seasons both visually and from a gameplay perspective to the tiny, little details that the game crams into its world to bring it to life and maximize the players’ immersion in a plethora of small but collectively significant ways- there’s a lot to talk about on this front, and that’s exactly what this video is about.
title: 15 Stunning Details In Assassin's Creed Shadows YOU LIKELY MISSED

author: GamingBolt
description:
Unreal Engine 5 is in its third year of release and devs are beginning to really master the engine’s diverse toolkit. 2025 has a surprising array of graphically stunning games across a diverse range of genres. 

The 15 games listed here either have concrete release dates this year or are generally expected to launch in 2025. Some games like Subnautica 2 and Terminator Survivors are launching in early access this year before a full release sometime in the future.

Whether you’re into blockbuster titles like Metal Gear Solid: Delta Snake Eater or can’t wait to dig into Little Nightmares 3, this year is looking to be pure eye candy for gamers.
title: 15 GRAPHICALLY STUNNING Unreal Engine 5 Games To Look Forward To In 2025
